FlowActive.description: Wait until a flow is active

FlowStandby.description: Wait until a flow is in standby mode

FlowDeleted.description: Wait until a flow is deleted

ImageScanComplete.description: Wait until an image scan is complete and findings can be accessed

LifecyclePolicyPreviewComplete.description: Wait until a lifecycle policy preview request is complete and results can be accessed

InputDeleted.description: Wait until an input has been deleted

ChannelRunning.description: Wait until a channel is running

ChannelStopped.description: Wait until a channel has is stopped

MultiplexStopped.description: Wait until a multiplex has is stopped

MultiplexRunning.description: Wait until a multiplex is running

InputDetached.description: Wait until an input has been detached

MultiplexCreated.description: Wait until a multiplex has been created

ChannelDeleted.description: Wait until a channel has been deleted

ChannelCreated.description: Wait until a channel has been created

MultiplexDeleted.description: Wait until a multiplex has been deleted

InputAttached.description: Wait until an input has been attached

AuditReportCreated.description: Wait until a Audit Report is created

CertificateAuthorityCSRCreated.description: Wait until a Certificate Authority CSR is created

CertificateIssued.description: Wait until a certificate is issued

NodeAssociated.description: Wait until node is associated or disassociated.

DistributionDeployed.description: Wait until a distribution is deployed.

InvalidationCompleted.description: Wait until an invalidation has completed.

StreamingDistributionDeployed.description: Wait until a streaming distribution is deployed.

CodeBindingExists.description: Wait until code binding is generated

StackImportComplete.description: Wait until stack status is IMPORT_COMPLETE.

ChangeSetCreateComplete.description: Wait until change set status is CREATE_COMPLETE.

TypeRegistrationComplete.description: Wait until type registration is COMPLETE.

StackCreateComplete.description: Wait until stack status is CREATE_COMPLETE.

StackUpdateComplete.description: Wait until stack status is UPDATE_COMPLETE.

StackDeleteComplete.description: Wait until stack status is DELETE_COMPLETE.

StackRollbackComplete.description: Wait until stack status is UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE.

DeploymentSuccessful.description: Wait until a deployment has completed successfully.

InstanceStopped.description: Wait until OpsWorks instance is stopped.

InstanceRegistered.description: Wait until OpsWorks instance is registered.

InstanceOnline.description: Wait until OpsWorks instance is online.

InstanceTerminated.description: Wait until OpsWorks instance is terminated.

FunctionUpdated.description: Waits for the function's LastUpdateStatus to be Successful.

FunctionActive.description: Waits for the function's State to be Active.

ReplicationInstanceDeleted.description: Wait until DMS replication instance is deleted.

ReplicationTaskDeleted.description: Wait until DMS replication task is deleted.

ReplicationTaskRunning.description: Wait until DMS replication task is running.

ReplicationTaskReady.description: Wait until DMS replication task is ready.

ReplicationTaskStopped.description: Wait until DMS replication task is stopped.

EndpointDeleted.description: Wait until testing endpoint is deleted.

ReplicationInstanceAvailable.description: Wait until DMS replication instance is available.

CacheClusterDeleted.description: Wait until ElastiCache cluster is deleted.

ReplicationGroupDeleted.description: Wait until ElastiCache replication group is deleted.

ReplicationGroupAvailable.description: Wait until ElastiCache replication group is available.

CacheClusterAvailable.description: Wait until ElastiCache cluster is available.

WaitForReplicationSetDeleted.description: Wait for a replication set to be deleted

WaitForReplicationSetActive.description: Wait for a replication set to become ACTIVE

ProjectVersionRunning.description: Wait until the ProjectVersion is running.

ProjectVersionTrainingCompleted.description: Wait until the ProjectVersion training completes.
